skills.name: Berserk Strike
skills.description: Enter a state of rage, delivering a powerful but reckless attack.

skills.name: Iron Defense
skills.description: Harden your defences, reducing incoming damage.

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.description: Focus your energy on healing wounds and regaining lost health.

skills.name: Precision Strike
skills.description: Target the enemy's weak spot for a precise and devastating attack.
skills.effect: Ignores a portion of the enemy's DEF; deals bonus damage based on ATK.

skills.name: Rapid Assault
skills.description: Delivers a powerful attack that sacrifices some of your own health to deal greater damage to the enemy.
skills.effect: Deals significant damage based on your attack power, but at the cost of your own health.

skills.name: Shield Bash
skills.description: Bash the enemy with your shield, staggering and damaging them.
skills.effect: Deals damage based on your DEF.

skills.name: Vital Strike
skills.description: High-reward attack that has a chance to deal either massive or moderate damage.
skills.effect: It has a 50% chance to either inflict a critical hit with very high damage or a regular hit with moderate damage.

skills.name: Soul Strike
skills.description: Unleash a powerful strike infused with your soul's energy.
skills.effect: Deals damage based on ATK and SOUL.

skills.name: Guardian's Shield
skills.description: Summon a protective shield fueled by your soul energy.
skills.effect: Increases HP based on your SOUL energy and DEF.

skills.name: Soul Armour
skills.description: Envelop yourself in a layer of soul energy to bolster your defences.
skills.effect: Increases DEF based on your SOUL energy.

skills.name: Soul Infusion
skills.description: Infuse your weapon with soul energy, empowering your next attack.
skills.effect: Increases ATK based on SOUL and ignores the enemy's DEF.

enemies.name: Cave Minion
enemies.description: Small, nimble creatures that lurk in the shadows of the cave, using sharp claws and speed to attack intruders.
enemies.appearance: Hunched, with glowing eyes and dark, leathery skin.

enemies.name: Minion Guard
enemies.description: Larger, more armoured versions of the Cave Minions, responsible for protecting key areas within the cave.
enemies.appearance: Stocky, wearing makeshift armour with crude weapons like clubs and spears.

enemies.name: Cave Minion
enemies.description: Small, nimble creatures that lurk in the shadows of the cave, using sharp claws and speed to attack intruders.
enemies.appearance: Hunched, with glowing eyes and dark, leathery skin.

enemies.name: Temple Minion
enemies.description: Guardians of the temple, trained to protect its secrets and treasures from intruders.
enemies.appearance: Agile, monk-like figures with simple robes and swift, precise movements.

enemies.name: Base General
enemies.description: The leader of the minion forces within the base, commanding troops and devising strategies to defend against intruders.
enemies.appearance: Taller and more imposing, with better-crafted armour and a commanding presence.

enemies.name: Warrior Spirit of the Grave
enemies.description: Ancient warriors whose spirits have been disturbed, now guarding sacred grounds and attacking any who trespass.
enemies.appearance: Ghostly figures clad in old, tattered armour, wielding spectral weapons.

enemies.name: Sacred Temple Protector
enemies.description: The main defender of the temple, a powerful and disciplined warrior devoted to keeping the temple sanctified.
enemies.appearance: Tall and imposing, wearing ornate armour and wielding a large, ceremonial weapon.

enemies.name: Eternal Darkness Ascendant (EDA) (full life)
enemies.description: The main antagonist, a dark sorcerer or powerful entity who has been corrupting the land and capturing souls.
enemies.appearance: Enshrouded in darkness, with piercing eyes and a menacing presence, wielding dark magic and commanding fearsome minions.
